note.p: American lawyer. Resided in Boston. Captain in the Union army in the American Civil War.
Births registered in the city of Boston during the year 1872 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 August 2014)
Massachusetts, find a grave index, 1620–2013 (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 August 2014)
National Archives and Records Administration: consolidated enrollment lists, 1863–1865 (Civil War Union draft records) (Ancestry.com, accessed 14 August 2014)
